explanation: The DishSponge can be used to rinse the kiwi and apple. The Knife can be used to cut the kiwi or apple if needed. The Bowl can be used to hold the rinsed kiwi or apple. The PaperTowelRoll can be used to dry the kiwi or apple before putting it in the fridge. And finally, the Apple is one of the fruits mentioned in the task.
